episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4001_1001_01:
You seem more engrossed in your research
than ever.
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4001_1001_04:
Is this Virizion? Wow! That’s a Legendary
Pokémon!
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4001_1001_05: Yeah. I caught it before coming to Pasio.
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4001_1001_06: It still hasn’t opened up to me, though...
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4001_1001_07:
We haven’t even battled together because it hasn’t
accepted me as its Trainer.
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4001_1001_08:
I wonder why it went willingly into a Poké Ball in
the first place...
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4001_1001_10:
If that’s what you’re worried about, why don’t you
take part in the Neo Champion Stadium?
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/6801_1031_01:
I want to serve as a role
model to others!
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/6801_1001_01:
There are so many Trainers on Pasio worth
learning from!
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/6801_1001_02: We need to work hard to be like them!
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/6801_1001_03: Yes! That’s both our mission and our responsibility!
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4002_1001_02: N-no way! I’m not strong like you and Hilbert!
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4002_1001_03: Really? That’s not what I think.
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4002_1001_04: We both know you love Pokémon battles, Bianca.
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4002_1001_05:
The day we got our first Pokémon, you were the
first one who wanted to battle.
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4002_1001_06:
And afterward, we all set out on our separate
journeys, with the goal of becoming stronger.
Don’t you remember?
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4002_1001_07:
I know since then, we’ve all gone through a lot of
different experiences in Unova and on Pasio.
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4002_1001_08:
Perhaps our goal is no longer simply to “become
stronger.”
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4002_1001_10: In a good way, of course!
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4002_1001_11:
Yeah... Strength can mean so many
different things.
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4002_1001_12:
The title of Neo Champion is awarded to Trainers
on Pasio who serve as role models and examples
for others to follow.
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4002_1001_13:
So being strong in Pokémon battles isn’t the only
thing that’s taken into consideration.
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4002_1001_14:
If you and I can teach others our definition of
strength...
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4002_1001_15: I think we can advance even further.
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4002_1001_16:
That’s the main reason I invited you to take part in
the competition.
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4002_1001_17:
And if you can show Virizion what strength means
to you, I think it might accept you.
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4002_1001_19: I want to take a new step forward...
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4002_1001_20:
Who better to take it with than you—the person
who set out with me on her own journey that day!
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4002_1001_21: Let’s all take our first step on Route 1 together!
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4002_1001_24:
Perhaps my selfishness is why I’m hoping you’ll
take part in the competition.
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4002_1001_25:
But if you’re even the slightest bit interested, I
hope you’ll give it some serious thought.
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4002_1001_26:
Well, I do encourage everyone on Pasio to take
that first step forward...
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4002_1001_27: Gosh! I’m always saying that, aren’t I?
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4002_1001_29: I’ll show you how strong I am so you’ll accept me!
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4003_1001_02:
I am hereby informing you all of the next Neo
Champion Stadium!
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4003_1001_03: I, Iris, Champion of Unova, will be the head judge.
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4003_1001_04:
But this time, I’ll be assisted by the former
Champion of Unova!
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4003_1001_07:
I will now announce the judging criteria for this
competition.
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4003_1001_09: to show us what strength means to them!
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4004_1001_01:
“What is strength?” I’ve both been asked and
asked myself this question countless times.
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4004_1001_02:
When I look back on all the Neo Champions we’ve
had so far, I remember the various criteria they’ve
been judged on...
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4004_1001_03:
But I believe this particular criteria is the most
important for Pasio’s Neo Champions.
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4004_1001_04:
We’re asking each participant to inform the judges
beforehand what their definition of strength is...
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4004_1001_05:
and then prove to us that they embody that
strength!
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4004_1001_06:
How you prove this is up to you! It could be
through battle, or a performance of some kind!
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4004_1001_07:
Show us the strength you’ve gained during your
travels.
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4004_1001_08:
Iris and I can’t wait to see what you’ve got in
store for us!
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4004_1001_09:
Thanks, Alder, for that great explanation of the
competition’s judging criteria!
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4004_1001_10:
We look forward to seeing you all take on
this challenge!
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4006_1001_01: I see you’re still as disciplined as ever, Cheren.
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4006_1001_03:
Training at night for the competition after a long
day of teaching, eh?
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4006_1001_04:
Although, it seems like you’ve softened around the
edges a bit since you became a teacher.
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4006_1001_06: Now that I think about it...
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4006_1001_07:
I haven’t had many chances to have a proper chat
with you like this.
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4006_1001_08:
Back then...I remember Master Alder had really
taken an interest in you.
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4006_1001_09:
He said you reminded him of me—so, of course,
I was interested too.
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4006_1001_10: So...you came here to observe me, then?
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4006_1001_11:
“Take the opportunity of a battle to look at your
opponent, look at the Pokémon involved, and look
at yourself...”
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4006_1001_14:
Have you turned in your definition of strength to
the competition judges?
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4006_1001_16: What strength means to me...is clear to me now.
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4006_1001_17:
Back when I was too set in my ways, Alder helped
me open my eyes. I’d like to show him proof of
the strength I’ve found since then.
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4006_1001_19:
and even on Pasio, I’ve experienced so many
different things.
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4006_1001_20: Those experiences helped widen my perspective.
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4006_1001_21:
I think the fact that I became partners with
Tornadus is proof of that.
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4006_1001_22:
Now I can answer Alder’s question with my head
held high.
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4006_1001_23: I look forward to hearing your answer.
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4006_1001_24:
While I’m here, would you like to train with me
for a bit?
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4007_1001_02:
OK, Bianca! I’ve received your definition of what
strength means to you!
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4007_1001_04:
Hmm... I’m curious to know how you define
strength, Bianca.
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4007_1001_05: I don’t suppose you could tell me now?
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4007_1001_08:
For example, even though I’m weak at Pokémon
battling, I can still help people with my Pokémon
research...
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4007_1001_09:
So I’m going to do my best to show what I’m
capable of!
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4007_1001_11:
A friend once described strength that way to me,
and I’ve never forgotten it...because that’s how I
feel too.
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4007_1001_12: So you’re just parroting what your friend said?
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4007_1001_13: Huh?! Oh, uh... Was I not supposed to do that?!
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4007_1001_14: No, I think you gave a good answer.
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4007_1001_15: You and your friend are both very admirable.
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4007_1001_17: We can’t wait for the day of the competition!
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4007_1001_18: Me too! That’s when things will really get started!
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4008_1101_01: The day of the Neo Champion Stadium...
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4008_1001_05: What’s wrong? Are you looking for something?
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4008_1001_06: Uh-huh... My Pokémon went off somewhere...
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4008_1001_09:
(Not long after we’d started our journey...there
was a girl whose Pokémon had been stolen by
Team Plasma.)
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4008_1001_10:
(So Cheren and Hilbert chased after Team Plasma
and got her Pokémon back.)
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4008_1001_11: (And when Team Plasma went after my Munna...)
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4008_1001_12:
(I was surrounded by strong Trainers I could
rely on.)
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4008_1001_15: I’ll help you search! So don’t cry, OK?
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4008_1001_17: Virizion will help us search, too!
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4008_1001_18: Oh, um... Wait just a second, OK?
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4008_1001_19:
Hello. Am I speaking to one of the competition
staff members? I’m sorry to call so last minute...
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4009_1001_04:
Let me pose this question to you once again: what
does strength mean to you?
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4010_1001_01:
You made the right call requesting help from the
International Police!
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4010_1001_02:
Leave the rest to me! I’ll make sure these two get
home safely!
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4010_1001_03: Thank you, miss! Thank you so, SO much!
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4010_1001_05:
Stay together from now on so you don’t get
separated again!
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4010_1001_06:
I’m glad she was able to reunite with her
precious Pokémon...
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4010_1001_07:
But...what I came here to do must be finished
already.
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4010_1001_10:
I’ve been looking for you. I heard you suddenly
withdrew.
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4010_1001_11: Oh... I’m sorry I worried you.
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4010_1001_12: I didn’t get to watch your match...
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4010_1001_13:
So, what were the results of the Neo Champion
Stadium?
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4010_1001_15: Huh? They’re really taking their time, then...
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4010_1001_16:
Oh, I get it. You were looking for me while you
were waiting for the results.
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4010_1001_17: Not exactly. I haven’t been judged yet.
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4010_1001_18:
I asked Alder and the others to wait, so that they
could judge us both.
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4010_1001_21: I want to take a new step forward—with you.
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4010_1001_25: In fact, I might never be this selfish again.
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4010_1001_26:
Come on, let’s hurry. We’re keeping Alder and the
others waiting.
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4012_1001_03:
Looker told us why you withdrew from the
competition.
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4012_1001_04: You were searching for a lost Pokémon!
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4012_1001_05:
You should thank Cheren—he insisted that there
had to be a good reason for your absence.
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4012_1001_07:
You should ALSO thank the other judges and the
audience for waiting for you!
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4012_1001_08:
At first, Iris and I decided that only we would
wait, on the condition that Cheren’s assessment
would also be delayed.
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4012_1001_09:
But everyone else chose to remain here, so that
they, too, could witness your strength.
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4012_1001_10:
We normally would never approve of such special
treatment...
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4012_1001_11:
but we couldn’t disappoint everyone who believed
in you!
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4012_1001_12: Now then, let me ask you again!
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4012_1001_13:
Challenger Cheren! What does strength mean
to you?!
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4012_1001_16: You gave the same response, didn’t you, Bianca?
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4012_1001_18:
No matter how powerful you may be, you can’t
call yourself strong if you fail to use that power
correctly.
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4012_1001_19:
It’s the willingness to lend a helping hand to
anyone in need, no matter who they are, that
makes your strength truly shine...
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4012_1001_20:
Working on Pasio as a teacher has allowed me to
observe Champions from other regions, and they
have only solidified my belief.
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4012_1001_21:
The fact that Tornadus—who’s powerful enough to
drastically change the weather—has become my
partner...
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4012_1001_22:
That’s all thanks to this belief I hold—or at least,
that’s what I think.
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4012_1001_24:
What does one do with strength after they’ve
obtained it?
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4012_1001_25:
You have found your answer, Cheren—which
means I alone may not be enough to face you!
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4012_1001_26:
I believe I’ll let the current Champion of Unova
handle this and merely assist her!
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4012_1001_28: Then let’s begin, Bianca and Cheren!
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4012_1001_29: I, Champion Iris, will test the two of you!
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4012_1001_32:
(For Cheren’s sake... For everyone who waited for
us...I want to show them all my very best!)
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4012_1001_35:
It looks like you’ve both accepted each other!
Congratulations!
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4012_1001_37:
I look forward to all the things we’ll do together,
Virizion!
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4012_1001_38: Well, Bianca, are you truly ready this time?
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4012_1001_39:
This pair of childhood friends is about to prove our
strength to everyone!
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4013_1001_02: I present the new Neo Champions!
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4013_1001_04: Those Neo Champion outfits suit you to a T!
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4013_1001_06:
Of course! Have a little more confidence in
yourself, Bianca.
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4013_1001_07: We can’t let them leave us in the dust, you know.
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4013_1001_08: You’re right! We’ve gotta keep charging forward!
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4013_1001_09:
Don’t go charging forward TOO seriously, Hilda,
or no one will be able to catch up to you...
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4013_1001_11: Oh, come on! What are you talking about?!
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4013_1001_13:
Why don’t we all take a new step forward
together right here?
episode_event_ch0014_ch0102/4013_1001_14:
Great idea! Here’s hoping our new journeys are
each a success!
